links.*: Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series)

wikitext.*:
'''Ian Hogg''' ([[1 August|August 1]], [[1937]]), formerly of the Royal Shakespeare Company, provided the voice of [[Tom Bombadil]] in the episode "The Adventures of Tom Bombadil" of the [[1992]] [[Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series)|''Tales from the Perilous Realm'' radio series]].
